theDuelist:SealedPack.NAME: Small Booster
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRandomized cards from this set to your hand.

theDuelist:SealedPackB.NAME: Small Pack
DESCRIPTIONS: Open a booster pack containing cards from #yPharaoh's #yServant and #yMetal #yRaiders. Add #b
#yRandomized cards from either of these sets to your hand.

theDuelist:SealedPackC.NAME: Themed Booster
DESCRIPTIONS: Open a booster pack containing cards of the last type that you #ySummoned. NL Add #b
#yRandomized cards from this type to your hand.

theDuelist:SealedPackD.NAME: Large Booster
DESCRIPTIONS: card booster pack. Cards are #yRandomized. Guaranteed to receive at least one #yRare card.

theDuelist:SealedPackE.NAME: Upgraded Booster
DESCRIPTIONS: card booster pack. Cards are #yRandomized and #yUpgraded. Guaranteed to receive one #yRare card.

theDuelist:AirBottle.NAME: Bottled Wind
DESCRIPTIONS: Potentially #yChannels random offensive orbs at the start of turn, and gives orb slots when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:BlackBottle.NAME: Bottled Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: Draws and discards cards at the start of each turn, and deals damage to all enemies based on the number of cards in your discard pile when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:DragonOrbBottle.NAME: Dragon Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Gives you #yDragonscales and #yRandomized #yDragons at the start of turn, no #yEvoke effect.

theDuelist:DragonOrbPlusBottle.NAME: Super Dragon Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Gives you #yDragonscales and #yRandomized #yDragons at the start of turn, and sets the cost of #yDragons in your hand to #b0 when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:EarthBottle.NAME: Spell Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds #ySpells to your hand at the start of turn, and sets the cost of #ySpells in your hand to #b1 when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:FireBottle.NAME: Fire Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Deals damage to random enemies whenever you play cards. Reduces the #yTribute cost of #yDragons when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:LavaBottle.NAME: Bottled Lava
DESCRIPTIONS: Deals damage to random enemies when you #yIncrement. When #yEvoked, deals damage to a random enemy based on the number of cards in your hand.

theDuelist:GadgetBottle.NAME: Amazon Package
DESCRIPTIONS: Gives #yDexterity for the turn at the start of each turn, and applies #yGrease when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:GlitchBottle.NAME: Broken Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Triggers random actions at the start of turn and when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:MetalBottle.NAME: Liquid Metal
DESCRIPTIONS: Gives #yBlock when you #yDetonate, and deals damage to ALL enemies when you #ySolder. When #yEvoked, lets you choose to either #yDetonate or #ySolder #b2.

theDuelist:MonsterOrbBottle.NAME: Bottled Monster
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds #yMonster #yEggs to your hand at the start of turn, and sets the cost of #yMonsters in your hand to #b0 when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:SandBottle.NAME: Hourglass
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySlows random enemies at the start of turn and when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:StormBottle.NAME: Bottled Storm
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds #yPowers to your hand at the start of turn, and #yChannels #yLightning when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:SummonerBottle.NAME: Bottled Summoner
DESCRIPTIONS: Summons #ySpellcaster Tokens at the end of turn, and #yIncrements when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:SteamBottle.NAME: Bottled Steam
DESCRIPTIONS: #yIncrements at the start of each turn, and then deals damage that scales with max summons when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:MudBottle.NAME: Goopbottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Applies #yPoison to ALL enemies at the start of turn, and gives the player #yThorns when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:BufferBottle.NAME: Ojama Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Potentially increases all your current #yBuffs at the start of turn, and gives #yBuffer when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:TributeBottle.NAME: Magic Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the #yTribute cost of all monsters in your hand by #b

theDuelist:BigTributeBottle.NAME: Magician's Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the #yTribute cost of all monsters in your hand by #b

theDuelist:DestructPotionPot.NAME: Destruct Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yTribute all of your summons and gain #b

theDuelist:DestructPotionPotB.NAME: Destruction Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yTribute all of your summons. Obtain a random relic. #yTributing more monsters will increase your chances of receiving a rarer relic.

theDuelist:DragonfirePotion.NAME: Dragonfire Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: damage for each of your max summons. Affected by #yDragonscales.

theDuelist:BombBottle.NAME: Bombottle
DESCRIPTIONS: damage for each of your max summons. Damage is incrased by #b1 each time you #yDetonate, up to a maximum of #b20 damage.

theDuelist:WaterBottle.NAME: Water Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Draws cards at the start of turn and when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:HarpPotion.NAME: Bottled Harp
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySpirit #yof #ythe #yHarp: Spellcaster, Summon 1, Block 4, Channel a Light

theDuelist:DuelistPosionPotion.NAME: Summoner's Vial
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPoison to ALL enemies. Reduce your #yMax #ySummons by #b

theDuelist:WhiteBottle.NAME: White Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrades Spells and Traps when you draw them, and all cards in your hand when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:VoidBottle.NAME: Supertiny Blackhole
DESCRIPTIONS: Siphons #yTemporary #yHP from random enemies at the start of turn, and plays copies of Dark Hole when #yEvoked.

theDuelist:StanceSwitchPotion.NAME: Brewing Stand
DESCRIPTIONS: While holding this potion, whenever you switch #yStances, gain #b

theDuelist:MegaupgradePotion.NAME: Arcane Forge
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrade all cards in your hand until they cannot be #yUpgraded anymore.

theDuelist:FreezingPotion.NAME: Freezing Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yFrozen characters take #b50% more damage and deal #b90% less damage for one turn.

theDuelist:IcePotion.NAME: Ice Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yFrozen characters take #b50% more damage and deal #b90% less damage for one turn.

theDuelist:BurningPotion.NAME: Searing Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDebuff that deals damage to the owner at the start of even turns. On odd turns, #yBurning is increased by #b1 and has a #b25% chance to spread to other enemies.

theDuelist:GreasePot.NAME: Grease Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yGreased characters gain #ySlow equal to their #yGrease. If #yBurning, take damage equal to the sum of #yBurning and #yGrease.

theDuelist:ElectricPotion.NAME: Electric Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yElectricity. At the end of your turn, lose #b
Improves the magic number on your cards, in the same way that #yDexterity or #yStrength modifies the damage and #yBlock on your cards.

theDuelist:ElectricBrew.NAME: Electric Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: During combat, the magic number of all your cards is increased by #b
. Lose #b3 Max HP at the end of each combat. When used, gain #b2 Max HP.

theDuelist:SteelBrew.NAME: Steelbrew
DESCRIPTIONS: During combat, the #yBlock value of all your cards is increased by #b
. Lose #b2 Max HP at the end of each combat. When used, gain #b3 Max HP.

theDuelist:DetonatePotion.NAME: Detonator
DESCRIPTIONS: #yTribute the given number of #rExplosive #rTokens, triggering the explosive damage effect on random enemies instead of yourself.

theDuelist:GrimePotion.NAME: Grime Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yGreased characters gain #ySlow equal to their #yGrease. If #yBurning, take damage equal to the sum of #yBurning and #yGrease.

theDuelist:BurningPotionB.NAME: Blazing Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDebuff that deals damage to the owner at the start of even turns. On odd turns, #yBurning is increased by #b1 and has a #b25% chance to spread to other enemies.

theDuelist:SolderPotion.NAME: Time Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b1 card in your hand. Increase the chosen card's magic number by the given amount.

theDuelist:SolderPotionB.NAME: Solder Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b1 card in your hand. Increase the chosen card's magic number by the given amount.

theDuelist:DampPotion.NAME: Damp Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDamp enemies take damage passively whenever an #yOverflow effect is triggered.

theDuelist:DrenchPotion.NAME: Drench Potion

#yDamp enemies take damage passively whenever an #yOverflow effect is triggered.

DESCRIPTIONS: damage to an enemy. Increase the damage of this potion by #b3 each time you #yOverflow. Damage is reset at the end of each combat.

theDuelist:Soulbrew.NAME: Soulbrew
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #ySpecial #ySummon, deal damage to a random enemy equal to your #ySouls. Lose #b1 Max HP at the end of each combat.

theDuelist:Bonebrew.NAME: Bonebrew
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #ySpecial #ySummon, gain #yBlock equal to your #ySouls.

theDuelist:MagicalCauldron.NAME: Magical Cauldron
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #ySpecial #ySummon, add a random Power to your hand. Lose #b1 Max HP at the end of each combat.

DESCRIPTIONS: Choose any Duelist card in your deck. The chosen card gains the #yBeast keyword permanently.
